DOC.brief_summary: To examine effect strong CYP3A4/5 inhibitor itraconazole ( 200 mg QD ) multipledose exposure Lu AE58054 ( 30 mg QD ) healthy subject ( CYP2D6 extensive metabolisers ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Multiple Doses Itraconazole Multiple Dose Pharmacokinetics Lu AE58054 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Subjects eligible inclusion study meet follow criterion : Men woman , age 18 45 year . Body weight least 50 kg Body Mass index 19 28 kg/m2 . Good general health ascertain detailed medical history , laboratory test physical examination . Nonchildbearing potential use contraception ( sex ) . Women must pregnant lactating . Known CYP2D6 genotype ( Extensive metaboliser ( n=15 ) poor metaboliser ( n =5 ) ) . Other Inclusion Exclusion Criteria may apply .
